attributes.documentation: The exampleERC721 contract does this and that...
attributes.name: exampleERC721

attributes.type: literal_string "I am a third year student at the University of British Columbia. I aspire to be a future blockchain entrepreneur. Currently, I have student debt of amount $5000. I wish to raise funds so I can continue my education studying blockchain technology at Stanford."
attributes.value: I am a third year student at the University of British Columbia. I aspire to be a future blockchain entrepreneur. Currently, I have student debt of amount $5000. I wish to raise funds so I can continue my education studying blockchain technology at Stanford.
